name: AracnoSensei
description:
I advise you to use mozzilla firefox or google chrome, with safari it doesn't work for me

AracnoSensei is a serious game https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serious_game

With this game you can train your skills in Japanese by reading Hiragana and learning new words :)

To finish the game you need to complete 3 levels.

Have fun I hope you learn to read Hiragana :)
